title: The Texas governor is banning public schools from requiring masks. Here's what parents think
content:
1. The Texas governor is banning public schools from requiring masks. Here's what parents think  CNN
  2. Nearly 1 million Texans overdue for second COVID-19 vaccine | KVUE  KVUE
  3. California will mandate masks for another month. Texas will ban mask mandates in schools. Are both states going too far?  Yahoo News
  4. Editorial: Abbott banning COVID-19 mask rules doesn’t free Texans. It prolongs our misery.  Houston Chronicle
  5. Texas COVID-19 death toll rises to more than 50,000  KWTX
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
